data: `minecraft:behavior.ranged_attack` allows an entity to attack by using ranged shots. `charge_shoot_trigger` must be greater than 0 to enable charged up burst-shot attacks.

data.Name: attack_interval
data.Description: Alternative to "attack_interval_min" & "attack_interval_max". Consistent reload-time (in seconds), when not using a charged shot. Does not scale with target-distance.

data.Name: attack_interval_max
data.Description: Maximum bound for reload-time range (in seconds), when not using a charged shot. Reload-time range scales with target-distance.

data.Name: attack_interval_min
data.Description: Minimum bound for reload-time range (in seconds), when not using a charged shot. Reload-time range scales with target-distance.

data.Name: attack_radius
data.Description: Minimum distance to target before this entity will attempt to shoot.

data.Name: attack_radius_min
data.Description: Minimum distance the target can be for this mob to fire. If the target is closer, this mob will move first before firing

data.Name: burst_interval
data.Description: Time (in seconds) between each individual shot when firing a burst of shots from a charged up attack.

data.Name: burst_shots
data.Description: Number of shots fired every time the attacking entity uses a charged up attack.

data.Name: charge_charged_trigger
data.Description: Time (in seconds, then add "charge_shoot_trigger"), before a charged up attack is done charging. Charge-time decays while target is not in sight.

data.Name: charge_shoot_trigger
data.Description: Amount of time (in seconds, then doubled) a charged shot must be charging before reloading burst shots. Charge-time decays while target is not in sight.

data.Name: ranged_fov
data.Description: Field of view (in degrees) when using sensing to detect a target for attack.

data.Name: set_persistent
data.Description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: During attack behavior, this multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving toward the target.

data.Name: swing
data.Description: If a swing animation (using variable.attack_time) exists, this causes the actor to swing their arm(s) upon firing the ranged attack.

data.Name: target_in_sight_time
data.Description: Minimum amount of time (in seconds) the attacking entity needs to see the target before moving toward it.

data.Name: x_max_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

data.Name: y_max_head_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.
